tossup_question: 9) CHEMISTRY  Which of the following elements acts as a catalyst for destroying ozone in the upper atmosphere:
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) Sulfur 
X) Chlorine 
Y) Nitrogen 
Z) Helium
bonus_question: 10) CHEMISTRY  Consider an acid solution whose density is 1.5 grams per cubic centimeter and which is 30% acid by mass. Find the volume, in milliliters, of the acid solution that is needed to contain 90 grams of acid:
bonus_answer: ANSWER: 200 (Solution: 90g acid × 100g soln/30g acid × 1cm3 /1.5 g soln = 200 cm3 = 200 ml)
